description:
Luffy`s team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn`t realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for! Meanwhile, the leading families and leaders of the world make their way to Mariejois for the pivotal world meeting!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Weg zur Reverie – Vivi und Shirahoshi
Direction Rêverie. La princesse Vivi et la princesse Shirahoshi
Reverie e: Oujo Vivi to Shirahoshi-hime
To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!
На собрание королей! Принцесса Виви и принцесса Ширахоши
إلى ريفيري! الأميرة فيفي والأميرة شيراهوشي!
世界会議[レヴェリー]へ 王女ビビとしらほし姫
